summary: This document contains information regarding Viet Cong concentration on terrorist and military subversion activity in the capital area of South Vietnam in early April 1963. It details plans to increase terrorist activity, target Americans, and reorganize counterpropaganda personnel.
title: Central Intelligence Agency Information Report
recipient: STATE/INR DIA ARMY/ACSI NAVY AIR JCS SECDEF NSA. NIC A.ID USIA OC I ONE OCR ORR OBI 00 IDII
